request.description:
You should get code using this API endpoint :
{{server_url}}/user_identifiers/send_verification_code

item.name: Add Identifier (By Logged in user for himself)
Add Identifier (For another user by admin)

response.name: 422 - Validation Error

item.name: Upload Avatar Image By Admin For Others
Upload Avatar Image By User for himself

item.name: Revoke User Token (Admin calls this API)
